title: nf-core/phaseimpute pipeline - params.posfile schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.posfile

panel.errorMessage: Panel name must be provided as a string and cannot contain spaces

chr.errorMessage: Chromosome name must be provided as a string and cannot contain spaces

vcf.errorMessage: VCF with sites per chromosome must be provided. Must have .vcf.gz extension

index.errorMessage: VCF index with sites per chromosome file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf' or '.bcf' with optional '.gz' extension and with '.csi' or '.tbi' extension

hap.errorMessage: Hap file can be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.hap' with '.gz' extension

legend.errorMessage: Legend file can be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.legend' with '.gz' extension
